 1998-20921998-11-260,  ,  ,  NR,  , 
PrecisEnactment of the CERTAIN TAXPAYERS REMISSION ORDER, 1998-2 - which provides for the remission of (a) income tax and interest payable by 27 individuals, (b) income tax and interest payable by Judges or former Judges of the Court of Quebec who made RRSP contributions exceeding their deduction limits, and (c) tax on income from farming payable by a partnership.
RegistrationRegistration: SI / 1998-0121 Publication Date: 1998-12-09
Attachments
precis:
Enactment of the CERTAIN TAXPAYERS REMISSION ORDER, 1998-2 - which provides
for the remission of (a) income tax and interest payable by 27 individuals,
(b) income tax and interest payable by Judges or former Judges of the Court
of Quebec who made RRSP contributions exceeding their deduction limits, and
(c) tax on income from farming payable by a partnership.
